data.text: “Nenga nzabibu gwa kweli, Awawa bango alemi
Kila lutambi nkati jango lwangapambika ngoko benia kuluboya, nakila lutambi olupambike kuluunila kupala lupambike muno.
Mangweto mwe mmilingite chwapi kwa magambu ga nhwalo go gunanengile.

Ntamange nkati jango, nane mandama nkati jinu. Andi yene lutambi kuotwaje jika jakwe kupambika ngoko nukutamaje munkongo gwa zabibu, na yene uyo mangwetomwe kuotwaje kupambika ngoko nukutamaje nkati jango.
“Nenga nga nzabibu, mangweto mwe ndambi. Ojwatama nkati jango na ne anda mbi nkati jakwe jweno mapambika ngoko majingi. Mana na neje, nhwotolangaje kutenda chachoa chela.
Mundu jwajoa jola anda nukutamaje nkati jango, kunneke panja andi lutambi nu kujoma. Bandu kulokota ndambi andi yene nukuilekela pamwoto itinike.
Anda ntamite nkati jango na malobe gango anda gatamite nkati jinu, bai, nnyopechachoa chela mampata.
Kibumo cha Awawa bango kibonekane anda mpambike ngoko majingi nukube akinapunji bango.
Nenga nampailinge andi Awawa pabambaile nenga, ntamanga mumapalano gango.
Anda nkamwile amuli jango mantamanga mumapalano gango, andi yene nenga pangamwile amuli ja Awawa nukutama mumapalano gabe.
“Nannengile ilebe yenie mbala laa jango jibe nkati jinu nalaa jinu jikomale.
Jenje nga amuli jango, mpalane andi panampala mangweto.
Gabije mapalano makolongwa muno kupeta mapalano ga mundu jwaboya bwomi gwakwe kumagambo ga kaganja mundu.
Mangwetomwe makaganja bango anda nteilinge ganunhwamulicha.
Mangwetomwe nankema kabeje makapakachi, mana mpakachi kumanyaje gabatenda angwana mundu, nambu nenga nankema mangweto makaganja kumagambu nanandulile goa ganajoa kuboka ka Awawa bango.
Mangweto unjagulingeje ne, nambu ne nanchagwile nukuntuma nnyende mukapambike ngoko, ngoko agalama, bombe Awawa bampe chachoachela champa kujopa kuliina lyango.
Bai amuli jango kwinu nga jenje, mpalane.
“Anda dunia janchimwa mangweto, nkombakela jinjimwite oti nenga.
Makabi mabandu bapadunia, dunia kabi jimpaile andi bandu baakwe. Nambu kwa magambu mangweto bapaduniaje, ila ne nanchagulinge kuboka padunia, kwa magambu genia dunia janchimwanga.
Nkombokelange aganannengelinge, ‘Mmanda nkolongwaje kumpeta nngwanamundu.’ Anda bandu bambotike ne, bapakumpotekanga namangweto uyo, anda bandu bagapenekia maboulo gango, mabagapenekia naginu uyo.
Nambu genia goa mabantendela mangweto kwa magambu mangweto mwe bango, magambu bumanyije jwajo ojwa ndumite.
Nakabi nukuwikaje nukulonge nabo, bakabinagoje mabaja, nambu ngoe kuotwaje kukikoola kube banga mabaja.
Abanjimwa nenga, bachimwa Awawa bango uyo.
Ikabi nukutendaje kwabe eibi yangatenda mundu jwajotejola, bakabije na mabaja, nambu ngoe baloile gandendite ngabanjimwanga na Awawa bango uyo.
Nga kwamaana gaga gagaandikigwe Mumalagilo gabe kweli, ‘Batekunjimwanga pangamalemwa.’
“Papakuika nnyangati, jwenio Uhuke jwa Nnoongo, jwambakuntuma kwinu kuboka kwa Awawa, jweno Uhuke ba Nnoongo, apakunjalakicha ne.
Namangwetumwe uyo maunjalakicha kwa magambu makiba na ne pamwe pitumbala.
